Ice giants are tall, light blue creatures that appear at certain icy areas of the games. Ice giants have two separate variants where they appear to be holding different weapons; a longsword or a warhammer. These monsters can be commonly assigned by the Slayer master Vannaka.

The ones located at the ground level of the White Wolf Mountain are rather tricky to reach. To reach them, mine the boulder located west of the Ice warriors (requires 50 Mining) and climb down the southernmost ladder, then take the south-west path leading to another ladder, then climb up. Once you come up the ladder, the first two can be safespotted by the trees. Alternatively, you can use a ranged weapon to hit them from the mountain path, but this puts you at risk of being hit by the wolves (something to take into account if you're a low level).

The Ice Giants located at the Frozen Waste Plateau span both a free-to-play area and a members only area.
